resources.string: All the images used under fair usage policy.If you have any concern please send email to selficelebriti@gmail.com

Selfie with Celebrity. Ever wanted to be with a Celebrity? Well, now you can and share it with your Friends too.
 
 No Photoshop skills required, all you want is your Android mobile with a Camera.
 You can take Picture with Famous Celebrities / Rare or Extinct Animals and lots more..
